programme.desc: A rundown truck barrels down the road, transporting its "illegal" human cargo under the cover of night. On board is Guo, a kind and honest young man who doesn't think of himself as an illegal immigrant.(n)

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: While two criminals hide out at a woman's apartment after a botched robbery, an ex-cop tries to find a missing gun.(n)

programme.title: Sixty Million Dollar Man
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays a rich playboy who is blown up by a mafia boss when he flirts with the boss' girl. Through a series of circumstances his professor makes him a synthetic body that allows him to change into a variety of household products.(n)

programme.title: The Knight Of Shadows: Between Yin And Yang
programme.desc: A legendary demon hunter tracks down beasts that enter the human dimension, assisted by a lawman protege and a motley group of friendly monsters.(n)

programme.title: Kick Ass Girls
programme.desc: Friends and owners of a boxing gym, Bo, Miu and TT, face different problems in life, friendships and love as they approach their 30s. Drawn by a lucrative prize, the three of them embark on an adventure in Malaysia where they fall into a trap set by a mysterious woman Zhuge.(n)

programme.title: The Miracles Of The Namiya General Store
programme.desc: In 2012, Atsuya and his two childhood friends do something bad and run into an old general store. They decide to stay there until the morning. Late into the night, Atsuya sees a letter in the mailbox.(n)

programme.title: A Fool In Love, Love Like A Fool
programme.desc: Xiao-wei enjoys reading picture books written by his favourite author Kauff. One day he meets Blue, a mermaid. Since then, Xiao-wei's 'normal life' becomes not so 'normal'.(n)

programme.title: The Lion Men
programme.desc: Shi Shen is the top performer in the Tiger Crane Lion Dance Association, but feels restricted by Master He's traditional mindset. He decides to take in a group of disciples and forms his own lion dance troupe, which fuses hip-hop and rock with lion dance movements.(n)

programme.title: Detective Chinatown
programme.desc: This action-packed comedy follows Qin Feng and his second cousin, Tang Ren, Chinatown's top detective, as they investigate a bizarre murder in which they become the main suspects. They find the world against them with just seven days to solve the murder case.(n)

programme.title: Filial Party
programme.desc: A group of contestants from various social backgrounds battle it out on a TV game show, I Am Filial, in which the one deemed most filial to his parents will win $1 million. Game show host Millionaire Liu (Mark Lee) plots to complicate things for the sake of increasing viewership ratings.(n)

programme.title: Endless Nights In Aurora
programme.desc: Two parallel love stories are reenacted across two-and-a-half decades. With equally heated passion, the star-crossed lovers in different generations are faithfully attached to their experiences in love through promises, anticipation, loss and forgiveness.(n)

programme.title: Mothers

programme.title: Cherry Returns
programme.desc: A traumatised young girl who was abducted 12 years ago is found alive. However, she carries out crimes on the orders of her abductor, and now the police must stop her before it's too late.(n)

programme.title: Hollywood Adventures
programme.desc: Ming goes to America for love. Wai goes there for his movie dream. Wei goes there for a reason. When the three inadvertently stumble upon an illegal import operation, they are forced to band together and go on the run from the authorities who believe them to be guilty.(n)

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: When Adam and Eva break up after 10 years, Adam thinks the breach was caused by one trivial incident, but Eva knows she's already forgiven Adam 77 times!(n)

programme.title: Undercover Duet
programme.desc: The story of rich kid Lee Mong Fong being entangled in a driving penalty points scandal becomes an overnight sensation in Hong Kong. The incident's only witness, Meng Tzi Leung, refuses to cooperate with the police. Detective Lau Mong Long goes undercover to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Napping Princess
programme.desc: In the near future, a high-school senior discovers that events in her waking life begin to parallel events in her dreams.(n)

programme.title: The Stool Pigeon
programme.desc: Police Detective Don Lee makes a bad call, causing a close informant to be injured. A year later, he must find a new man to go undercover inside a jewel-theft ring. Ghost Jr. doesn't want to do it, but Lee can offer deals and apply pressure that makes it hard to say no.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys Symphony

programme.title: A Chinese Odyssey Ii

programme.title: All Because Of Love

programme.title: Bad Boys Symphony
programme.desc: A group of criminals turn over a new leaf for a music contest. Young criminal Lei, who has repeatedly failed to escape from prison and get early release, finally joins the classical music ensemble.(n)

programme.title: Wonder Mama

programme.desc: In the Ming dynasty of China, Shen Lian, a secret police of corrupt government, is trapped by the conspiracy on a mission. To prove his innocence, he seeks the truth with a girl called Bei Zhai.(n)

programme.title: The Last Thieves

Many women feel turning 30 years old is a big step in their lives. The ageing issue not just affects them in feeling tired and experiencing loss of energy, but also drives them to feel sad.(n)

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: The story follows Chen Mo, a bar owner and 'ferryman' as he is slowly facing his own traumatic past whilst helping the people around him, including his co-partner Guan Chun, singer Ma Li and neighbour Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: The Wasted Times

programme.title: Haunting In Japan

programme.title: The Moment

programme.title: Love Is The Only Answer

programme.desc: Almost Genius is a self-contained, half-hour comedy series that celebrates the people, places and things that try so hard to succeed but come up just a bit short. But Almost Genius doesn't mock, because as everyone knows, almost is awesome…and genius.(n)

programme.desc: The zoo doctors go into hero mode, rescuing 16 macaws from a hoarding situation in Alabama.(n)
